thread.title: John Russell
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by John Russell

author: John Russell
title: John Russell
text:
This was my first purchase from Country Attire.
I live in New Zealand so really appreciated the free and very fast shipping. From payment to delivery was about 6 days.
The product is excellent. My boots are a perfect fit and exactly what I expected. Initially I had reservations about the boots and enquired about changing to a different style but decided to keep them.
The customer service was excellent and meant if I did want a refund or exchange this would be no problem.
I will very likely make another purchase from Country Attire.
Very impressed!.
